components.name: ButtonComponent
ButtonPageComponent
components.templateData:
Buttons / {{type.key}}

Height: {{type.value.height}}, min. width: 80px

Typography style: Paragraph 2 - medium

  • Default .p-btn.p-btn-{{type.key}}
  • Disabled [disabled]=true
    .p-btn:disabled
  • Default + icon left [iconBefore]="eye"
    .p-btn-icon-before
  • Disabled + icon left [iconBefore]="eye"
    [disabled]=true
    .p-btn-icon-before
    .p-btn:disabled
  • Default + icon right [iconAfter]="chevron-down"
    .p-btn-icon-after
  • Disabled + icon right [iconAfter]="chevron-down"
    [disabled]=true
    .p-btn-icon-after
    .p-btn:disabled
  • Default + icon right&left [iconBefore]="eye"
    [iconAfter]="chevron-down"
    .p-btn-icon-before
    .p-btn-icon-after
  • Disabled + icon right&left [iconBefore]="eye"
    [iconAfter]="chevron-down"
    [disabled]=true
  • {{buttonType.key}} [buttonType]=
    "ButtonTypeEnum.{{buttonType.key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + buttonType.key.slice(1)}}"
    .p-btn-{{buttonType.key}}

components.name: CheckboxComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-checkbox
  class="p-checkbox"
  [ngClass]="{'select-all': selectAll}"
  [aria-label]="ariaLabel"
  [checked]="checked"
  [disabled]="disabled"
  [indeterminate]="indeterminate">
  <ng-container *ngIf="label">
    {{label}}
  </ng-container>
</mat-checkbox>

           [ngStyle]="iconStyles"

components.name: InputNumericComponent
components.templateData: {{errorMessage}}

components.name: InputTextComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="p-input-text"
                appearance="standard"
                [ngClass]="{'p-input-text-readonly' : readonly}"
                floatLabel="always">
  <mat-label class="p-input-text-label">{{label}}</mat-label>
  <input matInput
         [type]="type"
         [placeholder]="placeholder"
         [readonly]="readonly"
         attr.aria-label="{{ariaLabel}}"
         [formControl]="customControl"
         class="p-input-text-input">
  <mat-error *ngIf="customControl.invalid"
             class="p-input-text-error">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.name: RadioButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-radio-button class="p-radio-button"
                  [value]="value"
                  [disabled]="disabled"
                  [checked]="checked">
  {{label}}
</mat-radio-button>

components.name: RadioButtonGroup
components.templateData:
<mat-radio-group class="p-radio-group"
                 [formControl]="fieldFormControl"
                 [class.invalid-field]="fieldFormControl.invalid && (fieldFormControl.touched || formControlHost.submitted)">
  <label class="p-radio-group-label">{{label}}</label>
  <p-radio-button class="p-radio-group-option"
                  *ngFor="let option of optionsList"
                  [value]="option"
                  [label]="label"
                  [ariaLabel]="ariaLabel"
                  [checked]="checked"
                  [disabled]="disabled">
  </p-radio-button>
  <mat-error *ngIf="fieldFormControl.errors">
    {{errorMessage}}
  </mat-error>
</mat-radio-group>

components.name: SlideToggleComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-slide-toggle
  class="p-slide-toggle"
  [aria-label]="ariaLabel"
  [checked]="checked"
  [disabled]="disabled">
  <ng-container *ngIf="label">
    {{label}}
  </ng-container>
</mat-slide-toggle>

components.name: TooltipComponent
components.templateData:
<p-button label="Label"
          #tooltip="matTooltip"
          [message]="message"
          [disabled]="disabled"
          [showDelay]="showDelay"
          [hideDelay]="hideDelay"
          [position]="position"
        >
</p-button>

components.name: TypographyFontFamilyComponent
components.templateData:
Typography / Font families

Source Sans Pro

Used only in caps, bold and 5% letter spacing, on headlines and highlighted areas such as menus, tabs, page titles, etc.

Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-accent
.font-family-accent
.weight-bold

Inter

Used in all the text of the paragraphs and wherever there is text in the lower case such as subheadings, buttons, etc.

Regular

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-regular

Medium

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-medium

Semi Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-semi-bold

Bold

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ1234567890/?.,<>;:!@#$%^&*()~`

$font-family-basic
.font-family-basic
.weight-bold
